description: Man Utd news: Harry Maguire and Manuel Ugarte doubts for Real Sociedad game
title: Man Utd news: Harry Maguire and Manuel Ugarte doubts for Real Sociedad game
title_page: Man Utd news: Harry Maguire and Manuel Ugarte doubts for Real Sociedad game - BBC Sport
maintext:
Harry Maguire and Manuel Ugarte will both miss the first leg of Manchester United's Europa League last-16 tie with Real Sociedad on Thursday.
The pair picked up what are being described as minor injuries by club officials during Sunday's FA Cup defeat by Fulham.
Neither player was present for the open section of training at Carrington on Wednesday morning and did not travel to Spain.
There was some good news for United head coach Ruben Amorim with the return of midfielder Toby Collyer.
The 21-year-old has missed four games with a muscle injury.
After the Fulham defeat, the competition represents United's last realistic chance to win a trophy and qualify for European football next season.
